function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of redundancy in bathroom and lavatory facilities in existing building stock","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of contagious diseases among occupants","Mitigation":"Installing additional bathrooms and lavatory facilities or redesigning internal spaces to create redundancy","Technologies":"Redesign of internal spaces, installation of additional wet cells, compartmentalization of internal usage, and installation of zoned air-conditioning with additional filter units","People":"Occupants and co-residents of existing building stock","Owner":"Property owners and building management"},{"Description":"Socio-economic divide exposed by COVID-19 related design concepts","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and transmission of contagious diseases for socio-economically disadvantaged individuals and families","Mitigation":"Promoting remote work and education, providing support for private transport, and implementing measures to reduce economic disparities","Technologies":"Remote work and education technologies, support for private transport, and socio-economic support programs","People":"Socio-economically disadvantaged individuals and families","Owner":"Government and community support organizations"}]}
